publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1788 Patrick Harvie: 7:84 - Private Agenda—That the Parliament congratulates the 7:84 theatre company on its latest production, "Private Agenda", which examines the state of public services and the impact of the private finance initiative; believes that political theatre is an important aspect of the cultural life of Scotland; recognises the role that 7:84 has played over three decades in developing and producing political theatre; believes that parliamentarians on all sides of the debate on public services should be ready to engage with such theatre and respond to the challenge that it offers, and wishes the 7:84 company well in the rest of its tour with "Private Agenda" and in its future productions. Supported by: Frances Curran*, Linda Fabiani*, Eleanor Scott*, Carolyn Leckie*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Christine Grahame*, Robert Brown*, Bruce Crawford*, Mark Ballard*, Stewart Stevenson*, Colin Fox*, Campbell Martin*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-1788 7:84 - Private Agenda (lodged on 29 September 2004) Mr Mark Ruskell*, Robin Harper*, Ms Sandra White*

S2M-1788 Patrick Harvie: 7:84 - Private Agenda—That the Parliament congratulates the 7:84 theatre company on its latest production, "Private Agenda", which examines the state of public services and the impact of the private finance initiative; believes that political theatre is an important aspect of the cultural life of Scotland; recognises the role that 7:84 has played over three decades in developing and producing political theatre; believes that parliamentarians on all sides of the debate on public services should be ready to engage with such theatre and respond to the challenge that it offers, and wishes the 7:84 company well in the rest of its tour with "Private Agenda" and in its future productions. Supported by: Frances Curran, Linda Fabiani, Eleanor Scott, Carolyn Leckie, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Christine Grahame, Robert Brown, Bruce Crawford, Mark Ballard, Stewart Stevenson, Colin Fox, Campbell Martin, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Mr Mark Ruskell, Robin Harper, Ms Sandra White, Tommy Sheridan*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-1788 7:84 - Private Agenda (lodged on 29 September 2004) Shiona Baird*
S2M-1788 7:84 - Private Agenda (lodged on 29 September 2004) Rosie Kane*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1788 7:84 - Private Agenda (lodged on 29 September 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-1788 7:84 - Private Agenda (lodged on 29 September 2004) Cathy Peattie*
